remarks:
The class union of the intersection of two classes.  Exercise 4.12(n) of [Mendelson] p. 235.  See ~ uniinqs for a condition where equality holds.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2003.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 29-Jun-2011.)

 The class union of the intersection of two classes.  Exercise 4.12(n) of [Mendelson] p. 235.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2003.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 29-Jun-2011.)
statement: uniin $p |- U. ( A i^i B ) C_ ( U. A i^i U. B ) $.
